name: Great Movie Quotes III Quiz | Which Movie | 25 Questions

questions.text: 'In his eagerness to save you, your God has also saved the Roman fleet!' -Jack Hawkins
questions.explanation:
Ben-Hur & Ben Hur.

	Spoken by Quintus Arrius (Jack Hawkins) to Judah Ben-Hur (Charlton Heston).

questions.text: 'I'm 60 years old, Gene. What are you going to do, write me a recommendation for the morgue?' -Richard Dreyfuss
questions.explanation:
'Mr. Holland's Opus'

	Spoken by Glenn Holland (Richard Dreyfuss) to Vice-Principal Walters (William H. Macy).

questions.text: 'The next time I have a daughter, I hope it's a boy!' -Paul Lynde
questions.explanation:
'Bye Bye Birdie'.

	Spoken by Harry McAfee (Paul Lynde).

questions.text: 'I could love you again, but I don't think I want to.' -Minnie Driver
questions.explanation:
Circle Of Friends.

	Spoken by Benny Hogan (Minnie Driver) to Jack Foley (Chris O'Donnell).

questions.text: 'Well, color me happy! There's a sofa in here for two!' -Julia Roberts
questions.explanation:
Pretty Woman.

	Spoken by Vivian Ward (Julia Roberts) to Edward Lewis (Richard Gere).

questions.text: 'Great balls of fire! Don't bother me anymore, and don't call me Sugar!' -Vivien Leigh
questions.explanation:
'Gone With The Wind'.

	Spoken by Scarlett O'Hara (Vivien Leigh) to Frank Kennedy (Carroll Nye).

questions.text: 'You are everything I never knew I always wanted.' -Matthew Perry
questions.explanation:
'Fools Rush In'.

	Spoken by Alex Whitman (Matthew Perry) to Isabel Fuentes (Salma Hayek).

questions.text: 'Dark and sinister man, have at thee!' -Robin Williams
questions.explanation:
Hook.

	Spoken by Peter Pan (Robin Williams) to Captain Hook (Dustin Hoffman).

questions.text: 'Men aren't attentive to girls who wear glasses.' -Marilyn Monroe
questions.explanation:
'How To Marry A Millionaire'.

	Spoken by Pola Debevoise (Marilyn Monroe) to Freddie Denmark (David Wayne).

questions.text: 'That fella's been the raspberry seed in my wisdom tooth long enough!' -Harry Hickox
questions.explanation:
'The Music Man'.

	Spoken by Mayor George Shinn (Paul Ford) about Professor Harold Hill (Robert Preston).

questions.text: 'I need a lift in your el truck-o to the next town-o!' -Brad Pitt
questions.explanation:
The Mexican & Mexican.

	Spoken by Jerry Welbach (Brad Pitt).

questions.text: 'I'm a paranoid schizophrenic! I AM my own entourage!' -John Cusack
questions.explanation:
'America's Sweethearts'.

	Spoken by Eddie Thomas (John Cusack) to Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal).

questions.text: 'We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams.' -Gene Wilder
questions.explanation:
'Willy Wonka And The Chocolate Factory'.

	Spoken by Willy Wonka (Gene Wilder) to Charlie Bucket (Peter Ostrum).

questions.text: 'What is my goal here, to make you a happy, well-adjusted gangster?' -Billy Crystal
questions.explanation:
Analyze This.

	Spoken by Ben Sobel (Billy Crystal) to Paul Vitti (Robert De Niro).

questions.text: 'Come out here, you little pipsqueak, and fight like a man!' -Rene Auberjonois
questions.explanation:
'The Little Mermaid'.

	Spoken by Chef Louie (Rene Auberjonois) to Sebastian the Crab (Samuel E. Wright).

questions.text: 'When you become a real boy, remember me to the ladies when you grow up!' -Jude Law
questions.explanation:
'A.I.'

	Spoken by Gigolo Joe (Jude Law) to David (Haley Joel Osment).

questions.text: 'No diet works. The only way to lose weight in the legs is amputation.' -Mare Winningham
questions.correct: St. Elmo's Fire & Saint Elmo's Fire & St. Elmos Fire & Saint Elmos Fire & St Elmos Fire & St Elmo's Fire
questions.explanation:
St. Elmo's Fire & Saint Elmo's Fire & St. Elmos Fire & Saint Elmos Fire & St Elmos Fire & St Elmo's Fire

	Spoken by Wendy Beamish (Mare Winningham).

questions.text: 'Brains stick with brains. A bomb could go off and their mutant genes would form the same cliques!' -Lili Taylor
questions.explanation:
'Say Anything...'

	Spoken by Corey Flood (Lili Taylor) to Lloyd Dobbler (John Cusack).

questions.text: 'When I buy a new book, I read the last page first. That way, in case I die before I finish, I'll know how it ends. That, my friend, is a dark side.' -Billy Crystal
questions.explanation:
'When Harry Met Sally'.

	Spoken by Harry Burns (Billy Crystal) to Sally Albright (Meg Ryan).

questions.text: 'Damn the man! Save the empire!' -Ethan Randall
questions.explanation:
Empire Records.

	Spoken by Mark (Ethan Randall).

questions.text: 'Nature, Mr. Allnut, is what we are put in this world to rise above.' -Katharine Hepburn
questions.explanation:
'The African Queen'.

	Spoken by Rose Sayer (Katharine Hepburn) to Charlie Allnut (Humphrey Bogart).

questions.text: Drew Barrymore: 'Was there a time, even in its smallest measurement, that you loved me at all?' Anjelica Huston: 'How can anyone love a pebble in their shoe?'
questions.explanation: Ever After.

questions.text: 'What's wrong with the way I talk? What's the big idea? Am I dumb or something?' -Jean Hagen
questions.explanation:
'Singin' In The Rain'.

	Spoken by Lina Lamont (Jean Hagen) to Don Lockwood (Gene Kelly).

questions.text: 'Over the mysteries of female life there is a veil best left undisturbed.' -Eric Stoltz
questions.explanation:
'Little Women'.

	Spoken by John Brooke (Eric Stoltz) to Laurie (Christian Bale).

questions.text: 'A woman happily in love, she burns the souffle. A woman unhappily in love, she forgets to turn on the oven.' -Marcel Dalio
questions.explanation:
Sabrina.

	Spoken by Baron St. Fontanel (Marcel Dalio) to Sabrina Fairchild (Audrey Hepburn).
